sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Dashboard.css'; function Dashboard() { const navigate = useNavigate(); const [user, setUser] = useState(null); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(true); const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState('overview'); const [menuOpen, setMenuOpen] = useState(false); // Sample data for dashboard const courses = [ { id: 1, name: 'Mathematics', progress: 68, instructor: 'Dr. Smith', nextLesson: 'Calculus II' }, { id: 2, name: 'Computer Science', progress: 42, instructor: 'Prof. Johnson', nextLesson: 'Data Structures' }, { id: 3, name: 'Physics', progress: 85, instructor: 'Dr. Davis', nextLesson: 'Quantum Mechanics' }, { id: 4, name: 'History', progress: 30, instructor: 'Prof. Williams', nextLesson: 'World War II' }, ]; const assignments = [ { id: 1, title: 'Math Assignment 4', dueDate: '2023-04-15', status: 'pending', course: 'Mathematics' }, { id: 2, title: 'CS Project', dueDate: '2023-04-18', status: 'completed', course: 'Computer Science' }, { id: 3, title: 'Physics Lab Report', dueDate: '2023-04-10', status: 'overdue', course: 'Physics' }, { id: 4, title: 'History Essay', dueDate: '2023-04-22', status: 'pending', course: 'History' }, ]; const announcements = [ { id: 1, title: 'Spring Break Schedule', date: '2023-03-30', content: 'Spring break will be from April 8 to April 16.' }, { id: 2, title: 'New Learning Resources', date: '2023-04-02', content: 'Check out the new learning resources available in the library.' }, { id: 3, title: 'Campus Event', date: '2023-04-05', content: 'Join us for the annual science fair on April 20.' }, ]; // Sample data for recent messages const recentMessages = [ { id: 1, name: 'Dr. Smith', role: 'Professor', avatar: 'S', status: 'online', lastMessage: 'Good question. For that particular problem, start with the product rule...' }, { id: 2, name: 'Jenny Williams', role: 'Student', avatar: 'J', status: 'online', lastMessage: '7 PM at the library, usual spot!' }, { id: 4, name: 'Mike Chen', role: 'Student', avatar: 'M', status: 'online', lastMessage: 'Thanks! I appreciate it.' }, ]; useEffect(() => { // Check if user is logged in const loggedInUser = localStorage.getItem('user'); if (loggedInUser) { const foundUser = JSON.parse(loggedInUser); setUser(foundUser); } else { // Redirect to login if not logged in navigate('/signin'); } // Simulate loading data setTimeout(() => { setIsLoading(false); }, 1200); }, [navigate]); const handleLogout = () => { localStorage.removeItem('user'); navigate('/signin'); }; const navigateToChat = () => { navigate('/chat'); }; const startVideoCall = (contactId) => { navigate(`/video-call/${contactId}`, { state: { contact: recentMessages.find(contact => contact.id === contactId) } }); }; if (isLoading) { return (

Loading your dashboard...

); } return (
{/* Sidebar */}
StudyPortal
{user?.name?.charAt(0)}

{user?.name}

Student

{/* Main Content */}
{/* Header */}

{activeSection.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + activeSection.slice(1)}

{/* Content Sections */}
{activeSection === 'overview' && (

Welcome back, {user?.name}!

Here's what's happening with your courses today.

4

Active Courses

3

Pending Assignments

85%

Average Attendance

B+

Average Grade

My Courses

{courses.slice(0, 3).map(course => (

{course.name}

Next: {course.nextLesson}

{course.progress}%
))}

Upcoming Assignments

{assignments.filter(a => a.status === 'pending').slice(0, 3).map(assignment => (

{assignment.title}

{assignment.course} Due: {new Date(assignment.dueDate).toLocaleDateString()}
))}

Recent Messages

{recentMessages.map(message => (
{message.avatar}

{message.name}

{message.lastMessage}

))}
)} {activeSection === 'courses' && (

My Courses

{courses.map(course => (

{course.name}

Instructor: {course.instructor}

Next lesson:

{course.nextLesson}

))}
)} {activeSection === 'assignments' && (

Assignments

Assignment
Course
Due Date
Status
Actions
{assignments.map(assignment => (
{assignment.title}
{assignment.course}
{new Date(assignment.dueDate).toLocaleDateString()}
{assignment.status.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + assignment.status.slice(1)}
{assignment.status !== 'completed' && ( )}
))}
)}
); } export default Dashboard
